sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Plus, Folder, BookOpen, FileText, Search } from 'lucide-react'; import PixelButton from '../PixelButton'; import PixelInput from '../PixelInput'; const LibraryTab = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [viewMode, setViewMode] = useState('grid'); // grid or tree // Mock data for now - we'll replace with real hooks later const folders = [ { id: 1, name: 'Personal', type: 'folder', itemCount: 5, color: '#FFD700' }, { id: 2, name: 'Work Projects', type: 'folder', itemCount: 12, color: '#87CEEB' }, { id: 3, name: 'Learning', type: 'folder', itemCount: 8, color: '#98FB98' }, ]; const notebooks = [ { id: 1, name: 'Daily Journal', type: 'notebook', noteCount: 15, folderId: 1 }, { id: 2, name: 'Project Ideas', type: 'notebook', noteCount: 7, folderId: 2 }, { id: 3, name: 'Code Snippets', type: 'notebook', noteCount: 23, folderId: 3 }, ]; return (
{/* Header */}

Organize your notes with folders and notebooks

console.log('Create folder')} color="bg-yellow-400" hoverColor="hover:bg-yellow-500" icon={} > New Folder console.log('Create notebook')} color="bg-blue-400" hoverColor="hover:bg-blue-500" icon={} > New Notebook console.log('Create note')} color="bg-green-400" hoverColor="hover:bg-green-500" icon={} > New Note
{/* Search and View Controls */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} placeholder="Search folders, notebooks, and notes..." className="pl-10" style={{ color: '#000' }} />
setViewMode('grid')} color={viewMode === 'grid' ? 'bg-purple-400' : 'bg-gray-400'} hoverColor={viewMode === 'grid' ? 'hover:bg-purple-500' : 'hover:bg-gray-500'} > Grid View setViewMode('tree')} color={viewMode === 'tree' ? 'bg-purple-400' : 'bg-gray-400'} hoverColor={viewMode === 'tree' ? 'hover:bg-purple-500' : 'hover:bg-gray-500'} > Tree View
{/* Content Area */}
{/* Folders Section */}

Folders ({folders.length})

{folders.map(folder => (
{folder.itemCount} items

{folder.name}

Click to explore

 ))}
{/* Notebooks Section */}

Notebooks ({notebooks.length})

{notebooks.map(notebook => (
{notebook.noteCount} notes

{notebook.name}

Click to open

 ))}
{/* Quick Actions */}

Quick Start

Create Folder

Organize related notebooks and notes

console.log('Create folder')} color="bg-yellow-400" hoverColor="hover:bg-yellow-500" size="sm" > New Folder
Create Notebook

Group related notes together

console.log('Create notebook')} color="bg-blue-400" hoverColor="hover:bg-blue-500" size="sm" > New Notebook
Create Note

Start writing immediately

console.log('Create note')} color="bg-green-400" hoverColor="hover:bg-green-500" size="sm" > New Note
); }; export default LibraryTab;
